xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/377860-Ballet Magnificat!: Snow Queen 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Snow Queen - An extraordinary, full-length ballet inspired by the Hans Christian Andersen classic and re-written to reflect the faith and heart of Ballet Magnificat!, paints a breathtaking picture of the majesty and glory of Jesus Christ. Audiences of all ages are drawn into a world where a splinter of glass has the power to change the hearts of men, and where a young girl fearlessly faces the fury of the Snow Queen with boldness, bravery and love. Snow Queen fantastically dips into the beauty of storytelling through the art of dance. Ballet Magnificat!: Snow Queen
